markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vivacious Bravado](/Feats.aspx?ID=1542) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You gained panache this turn.

</column>

---

Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier that last until the start of your next turn.
name: Vivacious Bravado
